column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Last night I decided to take a bath to help me relax .
#text=I gather all the things that will help me relax with a bath such as bath salts , bubble bath , and candles to place in the bathroom .
#text=I draw the bath by running warm water into the tub and then adding my favorite bath salts and bubble bath .
#text=I light some candles for a nice lighting effect and to add some aromatherapy and fragrance to the room to help me relax .
#text=I also gather a few of my favorite magazines to read while I am in the bath .
#text=As soon as the water filled the tub and at the right temperature , I get into the tub and let the bath salts and bubbles relax me .
#text=I will spend some time in the tub closing my eyes , relaxing , and then reading my magazines .
#text=It has been a long day and this bath will help me relax to go to sleep .
